title: Effect of increase in AD in the long run

content.question: In the long run, an increase in aggregate demand due to an expansion in the money supply will increase

choices.label: nominal output but not the price level
nominal output and the price level
real output but not the price level

content.answer: nominal output and the price level

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
